arrangements: Random deployment of examination functionaries in all centres.
PwD candidates were allotted to a PwD-friendly test Centre and extra organizational support was given.
Identity proof as mentioned by the candidate in online application form was included in the admit card for verification at the examination centre during biometric attendance.

committees.committee_name: High-Level Committee of Experts on the Reformation of National Common Entrance Testing in India
committees.committee_action: Coordinated with State and District Authorities to form committees and carry out physical audit of examination centres.
Successfully carried out physical audit of various examinations for the conduct of JEE (Main) 2025 Session-1 all across the country.

Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 1: Please go to the website https://jeemain.nta.nic.in/
Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 3: Login with your Application Number and Password, enter the Captcha Code as displayed and Submit.
Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 5: You will see the Question IDs in the below sequential order for JEE (Main) — 2025 Session 1(January 2025)
Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 6: The ID next to the question under the column ‘Correct Option’ stands for the most appropriate Answer Key by NTA.
Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 7: You may upload supporting documents for which you can select ‘Choose File and Upload (all documents to be put in a single PDF file).'
Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 8: After clicking your desired option, for Mathematics / Physics / Chemistry for Paper 1 (B.E./B. Tech.), scroll down and ‘Save you claim’ and move on to the next screen.
Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 9: You will see a display of all the Option IDs you have challenged.
Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 10: Click on ‘Save your claim and Pay Fee finally’.
Procedure for Challenge of Answer Key.Step 11: Select the Mode of Payment and Pay a non-refundable processing fee @ % 200/- for each question challenged. Make payment through Debit / Credit Card / Net Banking.
